title: Photo Of The Day: April 15, 2009
author: Christy Frink

contentEncoded:
We promise we’ll stop with the disaster panoramas soon, but this stunning shot of the riverfront flooding actually got buried in the photo pool from April 5th, taken by josed.velazco. For perspective, none of those flags are supposed to be underwater. Again, best viewed large.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
